Title: SECURITY ISSUE AND FIX
Message: Please Log Out And Relogin Back In Blox If you already were logged in before 1/25/2025 to fix game not loading, Blox will be rolling out a update that will be sending your user data to log in on the game platform, this is for future updates for avatars, web gameplay, etc. BE SURE TO UPDATE YOUR LAUNCHER BY UNINSTALLING THE FOLDER AND REDOWNLOADING THE LAUNCHER, BE SURE TO UPDATE BLOX, if not it will literally leak your account password in game.
